original_solution_mapping.L1: Sandra had 2 bags that each contained 6 pieces of candy so 2*6 = <<2*6=12>>12 pieces
original_solution_mapping.L2: Roger had 11 pieces of candy in one bag and 3 pieces in the other so 11+3 = <<11+3=14>>14 pieces
original_solution_mapping.L3: Roger had 14 pieces and Sandra had 12 pieces so Roger has 14-12 = <<14-12=2>>2 more pieces of candy

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3955.
    Returns: how much more candy Roger had than Sandra.
    """
    # L1
    sandra_num_bags = 2 # 2 different bags of candy
    sandra_pieces_per_bag = 6 # 6 pieces of candy left
    sandra_total_candy = sandra_num_bags * sandra_pieces_per_bag

    # L2
    roger_bag1_pieces = 11 # 11 pieces left
    roger_bag2_pieces = 3 # 3 pieces left
    roger_total_candy = roger_bag1_pieces + roger_bag2_pieces

    # L3
    roger_more_candy = roger_total_candy - sandra_total_candy

    # FA
    answer = roger_more_candy
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Sandra had {sandra_num_bags} bags that each contained {sandra_pieces_per_bag} pieces of candy so {sandra_num_bags}*{sandra_pieces_per_bag} = <<{sandra_num_bags}*{sandra_pieces_per_bag}={sandra_total_candy}>>{sandra_total_candy} pieces

Roger had {roger_bag1_pieces} pieces of candy in one bag and {roger_bag2_pieces} pieces in the other so {roger_bag1_pieces}+{roger_bag2_pieces} = <<{roger_bag1_pieces}+{roger_bag2_pieces}={roger_total_candy}>>{roger_total_candy} pieces

Roger had {roger_total_candy} pieces and Sandra had {sandra_total_candy} pieces so Roger has {roger_total_candy}-{sandra_total_candy} = <<{roger_total_candy}-{sandra_total_candy}={roger_more_candy}>>{roger_more_candy} more pieces of candy

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Sandra had 2 bags that each contained 6 pieces of candy so 2*6 = <<2*6=12>>12 pieces
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Roger had 11 pieces of candy in one bag and 12 pieces in the other so 11+12 = <<11+12=23>>23 pieces
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Roger had 23 pieces and Sandra had 12 pieces so Roger has 23-12 = <<23-12=11>>11 more pieces of candy

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'sandra_total_candy' (12) was used instead of 'roger_bag2_pieces' (3).
